title: Lab Report
description: Experimental report capturing background, methodology, results, and analysis.

milestones.name: Understand the task
milestones.description: Review the marking rubric, required sections, and submission logistics.

milestones.name: Review background and plan your introduction
milestones.description: Summarise theoretical context and plan how to frame the research question.

milestones.name: Draft your method
milestones.description: Document materials, procedures, and controls with enough detail for replication.

milestones.name: Analyse data and draft your results
milestones.description: Process raw data, create figures or tables, and describe key findings objectively.

milestones.name: Draft discussion – results – background loop
milestones.description: Interpret findings, link to background literature, and explain implications.

milestones.name: Final polish and integration
milestones.description: Ensure narrative flow across sections, refine visuals, and check referencing style.

milestones.name: Submit
milestones.description: Complete final proofread and confirm files upload correctly.
